job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: We are looking for a hardworking, innovative, and goal driven Senior Software Engineer to join our Enterprise Information Management team for a new HTML & Angular project. The ideal candidate will have excellent front-end and Angular development skills, including developing new user interfaces from scratch. Candidates should possess complementary skills on the back-end API and database layers.Remote candidates are acceptable, with a preference for local candidates in the Las Vegas or Henderson, NV area.Responsibilities:â¢	Develop quality Enterprise Information Management software utilizing Microsoft software development languages and tools.â¢	Create software designs for enhancements or features based on best practices.â¢	Participates in code and design reviews. Makes updates based on review recommendations.â¢	Keeps current on latest Microsoft development products.â¢	Provide support and maintenance on existing applications with the assistance of more experienced engineers as needed.â¢	Documents and demonstrates solutions by developing documentation, flowcharts, layouts, diagrams, charts, code comments and clear code with the assistance of more experienced engineers as needed.â¢	Demonstrate code quality through proper unit and other testing.â¢	Break down user stories into component tasks and provide estimates with the assistance of more experienced engineers as needed.â¢	Work in a collaborative development environment with a team of developers.The above statements are intended only to describe the general nature of the job, and should not be construed as an all-inclusive list of position responsibilities.Requirements:â¢	Previous Software Engineering experience (6+ years).â¢	Front End Development  o HTML5 (5+ years). o CSS3 (5+ years). o Angular 6+ (4+ years).â¢	Back End Development  o .Net/.Net Core/C#/EF/MSSQL experience (5+ years). o C# (5+ years). o ASP.NET (5+ years). o SQL Server 2008/12/16+ (6+ years).â¢	Visual Studio 2015+ / Visual Studio Code (5+ years).â¢	Object Oriented Programming (OOP) and software patterns.â¢	Basic understanding of agile software development principles and techniques. Understand iterative software development.â¢	Basic understanding of the software development lifecycle and multiple software development approaches.â¢	Desire to be part of a highly productive, fast-paced team.â¢	Four-year college degree or equivalent. â¢	Organized and detail-oriented.â¢	Working knowledge of Git version control system.â¢	Experience working on a Scrum teamPreferred:â¢	Knowledge of third-party JavaScript libraries (RxJS, Ngrx, Angular Material, etc)â¢	Knowledge of credit union and/or banking industry.The above statements are intended only to describe the general nature of the job, and should not be construed as an all-inclusive list of position responsibilities.Employee Polygraph Protection ActEqual Employment Opportunity Family and Medical Leave ActAlogent is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, or protected Veteran status.
